caption.p: Simulated changes in seasonal average net radiative flux at the surface in the (a–c) agricultural land cover change experiment relative to the natural vegetation experiment (Crops − Natural Vegetation) and (d–f) the agricultural land cover change with added irrigation experiment relative to the land cover change experiment (Irrigated Crops − Crops). Stippling indicates that changes are significant at the 5% level. MAM = March‐April‐May; JJA = June‐July‐August; SON = September‐October‐November.
